Package shop.command

Interface CommandHistory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandHistoryObj
    public interface CommandHistory
    An unbounded list of commands with undo/redo capability.

    Logically, the functionality is described in terms of two stacks: undoable and redoable, both initially empty.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(UndoableCommand cmd)
      Add command undoable and clear redoable.
      RerunnableCommand getRedo()
      Returns a RerunnableCommand that, when run does the following: Pop command from redoable, redo it, then push it onto undoable.
      RerunnableCommand getUndo()
      Returns a RerunnableCommand that, when run does the following: Pop command from undoable, undo it, then push it onto redoable.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add​(UndoableCommand cmd)
        Add command undoable and clear redoable.
        Parameters:
        cmd - the command to be run.

      • getUndo

        RerunnableCommand getUndo()
        Returns a RerunnableCommand that, when run does the following: Pop command from undoable, undo it, then push it onto redoable.
        Throws:
        EmptyStackException - if there is no undoable command.

      • getRedo

        RerunnableCommand getRedo()
        Returns a RerunnableCommand that, when run does the following: Pop command from redoable, redo it, then push it onto undoable.
        Throws:
        EmptyStackException - if there is no redoable command.
